body: This release is based on the Swift 5.8 release.
title: Swift-Markdown 0.2.0

body: This release is based on the Swift 5.9 release.
title: Swift-Markdown 0.3.0

body:
## What's Changed
* track inner indentation for doxygen commands by @QuietMisdreavus in https://github.com/apple/swift-markdown/pull/118
* Fix crash parsing document tree dump as markdown content by @d-ronnqvist in https://github.com/apple/swift-markdown/pull/123
* Refactored the `lex` function in the BlockDirectiveParser file. by @Mayank-84 in https://github.com/apple/swift-markdown/pull/128
* fix: fix to issue #132 (implementation of child(through) by @georgemp in https://github.com/apple/swift-markdown/pull/133
* Remove a expired link from README.md by @Ryu0118 in https://github.com/apple/swift-markdown/pull/138
* Fix typo in markdown-tool validation error by @Samasaur1 in https://github.com/apple/swift-markdown/pull/104
* Rename main.swift to MarkdownCommand.swift and add @main by @Kyle-Ye in https://github.com/apple/swift-markdown/pull/10
* consider queued newlines when wrapping elements in MarkupFormatter by @QuietMisdreavus in https://github.com/apple/swift-markdown/pull/116
* [5.10] Add link title support for commonmark by @Kyle-Ye in https://github.com/apple/swift-markdown/pull/147
* [5.10] Fix multiline directive without content parsing range issue by @Kyle-Ye in https://github.com/apple/swift-markdown/pull/157
* [5.10] Fix multi line symbol link source range issue by @Kyle-Ye in https://github.com/apple/swift-markdown/pull/156

## New Contributors
* @Mayank-84 made their first contribution in https://github.com/apple/swift-markdown/pull/128
* @georgemp made their first contribution in https://github.com/apple/swift-markdown/pull/133
* @Ryu0118 made their first contribution in https://github.com/apple/swift-markdown/pull/138
* @Samasaur1 made their first contribution in https://github.com/apple/swift-markdown/pull/104

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/apple/swift-markdown/compare/swift-5.9.2-RELEASE...swift-5.10-RELEASE
title: Swift 5.10 Release

body: This release is based on the Swift 5.10 release.
title: Swift-Markdown 0.4.0

body:
This release is based on the code that shipped into Swift 6.0.

## What's Changed
* Add link title support for commonmark by @Kyle-Ye in https://github.com/swiftlang/swift-markdown/pull/140
* Remove dependency on argument-parser by @ethan-kusters in https://github.com/swiftlang/swift-markdown/pull/149
* Fix utf8 decode by @zunda-pixel in https://github.com/swiftlang/swift-markdown/pull/145
* Fix multi line symbol link source range issue by @Kyle-Ye in https://github.com/swiftlang/swift-markdown/pull/151
* Fix multiline directive without content parsing range issue by @Kyle-Ye in https://github.com/swiftlang/swift-markdown/pull/154
* build: add a CMake based build by @compnerd in https://github.com/swiftlang/swift-markdown/pull/141
* Add 2024 as an accepted year number by @Kyle-Ye in https://github.com/swiftlang/swift-markdown/pull/160
* Fix Directive argument name and value ranges on non-first line by @Kyle-Ye in https://github.com/swiftlang/swift-markdown/pull/79
* Add support for Doxygen discussion/note tags by @j-f1 in https://github.com/swiftlang/swift-markdown/pull/159
* Add support for formatting the new Doxygen types using MarkupFormatter by @j-f1 in https://github.com/swiftlang/swift-markdown/pull/163
* Support Windows ARM64 builds by @hjyamauchi in https://github.com/swiftlang/swift-markdown/pull/164
* build: silence warning about CMakeLists.txt from SPM by @compnerd in https://github.com/swiftlang/swift-markdown/pull/167

## New Contributors
* @zunda-pixel made their first contribution in https://github.com/swiftlang/swift-markdown/pull/145
* @j-f1 made their first contribution in https://github.com/swiftlang/swift-markdown/pull/159
* @hjyamauchi made their first contribution in https://github.com/swiftlang/swift-markdown/pull/164

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/swiftlang/swift-markdown/compare/0.4.0...0.5.0
title: Swift-Markdown 0.5.0
